website_summaries.verdict: A great farmhouse sink that delivers quality at a lower price than comparable options.
cons: Smaller capacity than some of the other models

customer_reviews.title: The best and most beautiful sink out there!
customer_reviews.text: This sink the the first thing people comment on in my newly remodeled kitchen. I ended up taking out the bottom rack as I felt like I couldn't really clean the sink after rinsing dishes, and I don't mind the mild scratches that result. The sink is heavy, deep, beautiful and so durable. My two-year old and four year old both took a bath in it last week. I much prefer the stainless look to the porcelain ones out there and the cost difference is unbeatable. This is one of the best purchases we have ever made. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: LoveTheSimple

customer_reviews.title: Already rusted by the time we move in
customer_reviews.text: We just finished renovation and used our kitchen for the first time this week. And we already found serious rusting happening. Our contractor just install the sink less than a week ago. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Nero Liu

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well, looks beautiful in our new kitchen. It's huge and I love it! Seems to be great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tika Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Would give it 6 stars if that was an option
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 33" wide model which is perfect for our 36" wide sink base (on purpose - so we would have 1.5 inches on either side since our dishwasher is adjacent to the sink base). We were looking high and low for the best sink for us: deep, apron style, stainless, inset grate, bowed front. Really happy with its performance - i guess a sink doesn't necessarily perform per se. I installed it myself since I'm picky and handy. 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink!! I was skeptical about ordering something like this off Amazon but man this sink paid off. Looks fantastic with my new remodel and corian counter-tops. I love the fact that it includes a dish towel and sponge holder and bottom rack. I have experienced NONE of the slow drain problems people are complaining about. This is MOST DEFINITELY due to improper venting. I have a Moen disposal hooked up to it and it works fantastic. As for scratches ALL stainless will scratch even the $10K Wolf and Viking appliances you need to be careful. Fantastic sink!!! I have had mine for 2 months now and no problems so I am not writing this the day I installed it.
customer_reviews.author: CSP

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely pleased with the design
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with the design, appearance and high quality of the Zuhne sink I purchased. I did extensive research in a variety of copper, cast iron, porcelain and stainless kitchen sinks and finally bought the Zuhne stainless farmhouse model..it arrived promptly in perfect condition and was far better than I even expected. I don't know if this company makes and other products but I would certainly consider anything that I needed, based on the outstanding service and quality of the Zuhne sink! Ken Cook
customer_reviews.author: catnamedalex

customer_reviews.title: Great compay, great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Called customer service for advice before purchasing; it was like talking to a very helpful neighbor. This sink is very well built, easy to install, with many install options. It's amazing how many extra items are included with the sink. The basin is very large, but is insulated perfectly to deaden water noise. All the way from the quality of packaging, to install, to use of the sink, this has been a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: T. Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: stunning choice
customer_reviews.text: this is simply a beautiful and elegant design. I am so pleased to finally have a farmhouse sink that didn't cost an arm and a leg but is still stunning to look at. The extra details of the rack for the bottom of the sink, the sponge holder, the good sturdy microfiber cloth and the included drain w/ the basket strainer were really wonderful additions to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great.....I was concerned about pitting/rusting because I saw a review or two that mentioned this....it cleans up very easily but do already notice a rustlike spot ...it is under the foot of the rack....it could be just because that area catches food and does not get cleaned the typical rinse. You can't get too crazy...no one will ever see that spot because it is under the foot of the rack. Overall I think the sink is great. The fact that it came with the drain and basket as well as the base rack was a big plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: lisa defonce

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a stainless steel apron sink and once we got the remodel underway, I was more than happy with this product. The sink looks stylish and per my husband, was easy to install and the directions were clear. It comes with a lot of extras, like a grate to put into the sink so it won't scratch the bottom. The only thing I wasn't realizing, it is very easy to get water spots, so you have to wipe it quite often. I didn't have the same problem with my old undermount sink, but we'll see if that is turning into a problem and a lot of extra work.
customer_reviews.author: Jesena

customer_reviews.title: Very solid, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in HI in about 3 days. First impression was the heavy weight. Once removed from the box you see its quality, beauty, and toughness. Instructions imply can be flush mount but I don't see how unless you want to depend solely on caulk to keep water out. Undersink mount I think is the only practical option. Upon installation, the sink drains well. The grate they provide for the bottom is high quality with protective plastic on the feet as well as the sides which prevents metal-on-metal contact. The protection the grate provides more than outweighs the hassle of having to lift it for cleaning. Overall, a quality sink at a reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: pretty but...
customer_reviews.text: scratches very easy, ive had it for a month and the bottom and front have many scratches. great looking sink however 2 month update: this sink is NO GOOD!!!! its already rusting and turning colors and has tons of scratches, and we are not heavy on this sink. Not impressed at all. Save your money and look elsewhere !
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: The benefits far outweigh one flaw. This is a beautiful, solid, clean sink with lots of extras. It's nice it came with the grate to put in the bottom of the sink and great looking drain assembly. The only flaw is it is manufactured differently than shown in the installation instructions so I had to modify the cabinet a bit to mount it. Also, it is 24 - 3/8" wide, thus i don't know that it would work with a true 24" cabinet. Not sure how they made it so clean looking in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: John Z

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink. I remodeled my kitchen this past summer ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink. I remodeled my kitchen this past summer and wanted to have apron front, farm style sink. This one fits the bill. It is very good quality and looks great. I have been using it for 5-6 months now and it is just as beautiful as the day it was installed. Easy to clean and to maintain. I am able to remove water residue with Comet. It is also quiet. Received a lot of compliments/ questions regarding the sink. Everyone seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Farias

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality sink
customer_reviews.text: We bought this sink for our kitchen remodel. It is high quality, high grade steel, and very nicely made. This sink easily fits in a 30" cabinet base. I read that Zuhne is a women owned company. The extra details, like the sponge holder and the cloth are a nice touch. Also the stainless grid for the bottom is essential to prevent scratching and wear on the bottom. This was a great purchace.
customer_reviews.author: NapaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Affordable stainless steel farmhouse sink
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this sink for about a year now and I’m just as in love with it as I was on day one. I love how it matches the rest of my stainless steel appliances and how it comes with a few accessories to help protect the bottom of the sink. The stainless steel makes this sink super easy to clean and I get so many compliments on the style . It’s rare you come across a stainless steel apron farmhouse sink so well made and budget friendly. 100x yes to buying this! The company customer service is also great!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Olivier

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I do really enjoy this sink but it definitely took some thinking to install it!! We have a completely new kitchen, and bought a sink cabinet for a farmhouse sink, and it still had to be cut for the sink. The sink fits nicely, looks great, but my only complaint is that I wish it sloped a bit more down the sink hole. Because it's such a big bowl, it takes a while to spray the food down the drain without a nice grade to it. Other than that it's beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: EvenB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, large, good quality sink.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I flip homes and do 3 to 5 kitchens a year. We have used a number of farmhouse sinks over the years but just installed this Zuhne for the first time ever. The quality for the price was a GREAT value. We will definitely be using Zuhne again in future homes. For those wondering if they would like a single basin vs a double...I swore I would not like the single basin but after installing a number of them, I will be switching my own home to a single basin as it really is amazing how much more room you get.
customer_reviews.author: The Websters

customer_reviews.title: A Workhorse in my New Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 24” version of this sink for our kitchen renovation because it had all the features recommended in my research— slightly rounded corners; center drain with slight downward taper for emptying; and substantial depth, among others. Our cabinet maker actually took it for building the cabinet for it. I love the curved apron front, and the ledge at the top is very convenient. I clean it down at night and wipe down the walls as suggested. I got an incredible high tech faucet, and my 6” stone backsplash really helps contain my water sloshes! It is quite a large substantial sink!
customer_reviews.author: boomerdk

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Product . . . Heavy-Duty and Elegant!
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely beautiful product. Flawless heavy-duty construction and very elegant. The product packaging is even well thought out -- the sink is tied in its own oversized pouch. For me, this unit is replacing a competitors 18-guage sink. The Zune's 16-guage makes a remarkable difference in quality and sound. I needed to contact the company with a couple of product questions and found their customer service to be incredible (thank you David).
customer_reviews.author: Shintaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sink
customer_reviews.text: Has a sharp look to it. My only issue, I wish the creased drain lines had a little more slope to them. Sometime debris is held up by not water not hitting the drain fast enough. Takes a little talent to get the cabinet base cut and sink frame correct so you need a little skill as not all sink base cabinets are the same. As always, youtube has some great tutorials.
customer_reviews.author: Rich A.

customer_reviews.title: Update:  We've recommended this sink to many before putting it to the test ourselves, but no more.
customer_reviews.text: These have the worst slope ever! If you're looking for it to drain properly when washing dishes, forget it! It's not going to! You'd end up having to do twice the work EVERY TIME after doing dishes. Washing the dishes and then moving/washing all of the food particles down the disposal before you can clean the sink. Very inconvenient, disgusting, and not user-friendly whatsoever. Not recommended. No way, Jose.
customer_reviews.author: Zemma

customer_reviews.title: I'm in a wheel chair and I love the access this type of sink provides
customer_reviews.text: We retro-fit this to an existing kitchen and had a new granite counter-top installed over it. It was not a "beginner's" project but it wasn't really very hard to do either. You have to build a framework of wood for it to sit on. You have to get it leveled just right so that counter-top will fit perfectly above it. I'm in a wheel chair and I love the access this type of sink provides. Also the material and workmanship of the sink is wonderful. The quality and low cost of this sink (on Amazon) was a fantastic help to my kitchen remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wood

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful ungraded in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Had it professionally installed and it looks great! The only stainless steel 24” flat front I can find, other retailers don’t carry this size and claim it won’t fit in my kitchen bc the sink is at a corner so had to prove them wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Cal Mira

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sink!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is beautiful. It arrived well-packaged and it is very sturdy. I overheard my contractor showing it off to the tile installer. He told him it was beautiful, heavy duty and not something that's going to dent or ding. He also said that it looks really slick. It is all of those things, and it arrived to my door in perfect condition. I wasn't sure about ordering this online, but it was a great move. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Momofthree

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Farmhouse Sink!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful high quality sink! We love the design, the heavy duty stainless steel, and all the usefull accessories! It is super easy to install and to keep clean. We installed it top mount on top of a 36" IKEA base cabinet and butcher block countertops. You can install it top, flush, or under-mount. After a few months of daily use, our sink still looks fabulous like new! Full disclosure: we received the sink as a gift in our collaboration with Zuhne while working on our DIY IKEA kitchen remodel and sharing it on our blog A Piece of Rainbow. We really like this sink and will honestly buy it again and recommend it to others!
customer_reviews.author: A Piece of Rainbow

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Stainless Steel Farm Sink
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for a high end new construction home. I looked at many very expensive sinks in copper, porcelain, stainless etc, nothing could hold a candle to the quality of this sink. It is heavy gauge and constructed to last. Wanted something with some shiny Wow and this was it. I have recommended this brand over and over again to my clients and contractors and the price is more than reasonable. Everything was perfect from the order to the delivery. I highly recommend this sink and any other from Zuhne!
customer_reviews.author: salespro

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SINK! Reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT sink. I read all the reviews, I still ordered after reading the 1 stars. What I know is the folks who were negative did not read instructions, or install properly. We have been using this sink for 7 months, no rust at all. Scratches? I have worked in lots of commercial kitchens stainless steel scratched, period. It will stay nice looking if you only use the BLUE scrounge. Keep your belt buckle off the apron, oh, keep your apron over your belt buckle. We LOVE,LOVE, LOVE this sink.
customer_reviews.author: DAVE

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical of buying a sink online..
customer_reviews.text: With that being said. This is a Fantastic sink! It was so much less then going to the big box stores, for a comparable sink. We have been using this sink for aver a year now. Came with a nice little assortment of accessories. The only issue I had (all my fault) I misplaced the grid for the inside of the sink. Got a hold of Zuhne and they said a new one is $40ish. So I ended up buying a new one. Then BAM!!!! Found the original one. <SIGH> That is just how it always goes......lol
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: I love this sink
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink!! It is so well made and came packaged beautifully.. I was hesitant on purchasing because the price was so much less than the other sinks but I am so glad I did.. go ahead you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Weak drain piece
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: home depot drain proved to sit too high and water pooled. So I took the drain that came with it and sealed the heck out of it. Not leaking but it was a pain. Good quality throughout except the drain unit is flimsy and very thin. It's a stainless steel covering some other metal rather than a sturdy full SS piece. It kept leaking even after trying to seal with everything out there but it kept leaking. I went to HD and got a $20 drain and solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great Sink! This was installed on a 30" base, tight fit but I wasn't going to change my cabinets. I was missing parts and the manufacturer sent them out immediately along with some freebies! Now to finish painting and my kitchen will be done!
customer_reviews.author: Annmarie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink. It's great to have when you do ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink. It's great to have when you do a lot of cooking. We mounted ours under the counter-top with granite.Do not set hot pans on it. It will leave a mark, but it can be removed with scrubber sponge and elbow. The pitch in the bottom needs to be steeper. It takes a spray nozzle to get the debris, to go down the drain. So you will use a lot of water.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stetson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful well crafted centerpiece for our new kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this sink. Its low wide profile is perfect for a modern touch in our new country kitchen. Accessories very nice, expecially the grate. Included all items seen. Shipped promptly and packed very well. The only issue is the little suction cup holder keeps falling but with the grate, we just sit it on there instead and drains fine.
customer_reviews.author: StarbucksViper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing  sink and great price point.
customer_reviews.text: We love this sink! It’s extremely heavy duty and looks great too. It was easy to install as well. We just remodeled our kitchen and the first thing everyone says is, That sink! I love it!! Doing kitchen remodel as a DYI. Great looking sink and very easy install. The product was shipped using care when boxed up. All materials came in a bag. Very heavy duty. Recommend sink for the great price.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Built
customer_reviews.text: This sink is a nice thick stainless steel with good smooth welds and a flawless finish, I was impressed. However; UPS beat the living s*** out of the packaging , but do to Zuhne's over protective cloth bag that's wrapped around the sink in the molded foam protective shell it only had a slight bend in the back flange that goes inside the cabinet. I bent it back out with a rubber mallet and you cannot notice. Check your Sink as soon as it arrives!
customer_reviews.author: Insidious

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: We are using this in an enclosed screen room addition to our home. We purchased the 24 inch unit. This unit is of the HIGHEST quality... you will not be disappointed. In fact, the finish and polish are so well done, you will hesitate to use it ! Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my sink. It’s huge & beautiful & still looks great even though my mom is pretty rough on it. The grate protector thing is nice, but stuff gets stuck around the feet so it takes a little longer to clean out the sink. It’s not a big deal but I did find that a little annoying in the beginning. It’s a great farmhouse sink & the nicest design I’ve seen anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Haila

customer_reviews.title: Bargain for the quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a kitchen remodel. DEEP sink and is beautiful when installed. Impressed with the quality. Rack included is a bonus. Make sure to put it in a 36" cabinet, as it takes a full 33". Hooked it up with a disposal, so not able to use the strainer that came with it as well, but overall a great buy. Update: 2 years after the install, still LOVE it. 3 13 x 9 pans can soak in it (if I ever need that). My gbaby loves to take baths in it, too. If you are in doubt, BUY THIS SINK.
customer_reviews.author: C L Roll

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: After a month of install there is already rust on the bottom. Called company and they were very helpful. They are sending a product to use to remove the rust. If it works I will update. Other than that, it is a beautiful sink, I like the rack in the bottom and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great sink so far
customer_reviews.text: This shipped on time and installed ok (as far as farm sinks do). I was worried about some of the reviews mentioning water in the corners, but I haven't noticed any issues with that. It does stay wet and thus you can see water spots, so I'd like to buy some stainless steel cleaner, but haven't yet. Once the kitchen is finished, I hope to snap a pic to show others overall how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Laura's books

customer_reviews.title: Great sink, beautiful design.
customer_reviews.text: Love the depth and width of this sink. Thought it was going to be too big for my tiny kitchen but it has worked out perfectly. The only thing keeping this from being a 5 is the pitch. I just wish the pitch in the sink leading toward the drain was a bit better. Its difficult to get food particles into the drain so that along with soapy water tend to pool into the surrounding areas drying in those spots. If not diligent in cleaning after each use it always look like the sink is dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Davi Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sink! Super deep
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sink! Super deep, very impressed with how many dishes it hold. The strainer is a pretty nifty basket that is easy to get out to empty. I really like the grate on the bottom, I've not had a sink with that, and I love the function of it. Very pretty looking in my newly remodeled kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Holly Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: The sink arrived on time. Unfortunately it looked like it had been either installed beforehand or got scratched and dinged between when the product was manufactured and placed in the box. No damage to the shipping or manufacturer box. Just the sink. Couldn't exchange because needed installed same day. Will see how it holds up in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Nononymous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sink!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific sink. It is a great size and looks fantastic. We have noticed that you have to be a little careful cleaning any pots on the front lip as that scratched ours, but it is easily repaired with a little stainless scratch repair kit. The accessories are also quite helpful, and the deep drain strainer is awesome! Definitely a great addition to out kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Installed this sink in laundry room
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works well for a laundry room. I have a stainless sink in the kitchen and if i could do it over - I would have installed porcelain. Everything sticks to the stainless so I'm constantly cleaning/scrubbing it.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it's worth alot more than it costs.  I love everything about it.
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this sink and get alot of compliments on it. There was a bit of difficulty installing but I think that was more because of the angle of my sink to the side counters. Once installed and faucet hooked up, we couldn't be more pleased. Also the company that makes the sinks was helpful and responsive when we phoned with a question. We have since moved from that house and I would love to get this sink for my new kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: TaraMal

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sink. Super well built
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sink. Super well built, fit and finish is fantastic. It is coated ont he backside with a thick rubber like coating....which means it doesn't sound like a normal stainless sink when you drop something in it. It makes a solid thump instead of a clang. Great sink....would certainly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: martinarcher

customer_reviews.title: Great sink!
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than most and backing makes it quiet. It seemed much thicker than I expected it to be. It arrived very well packed and protected. The welds are perfect. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Love the sink
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Love the sink. Looks great. Love the rack inside the sink!! Cons: It had to Nebraska installed by a professional as there needed to be my modification to the cabinets. The stainless is somewhat difficult to clean....another words it doesn’t look spotless for long periods....hope that makes sense. I’m kind of thinking that there are different quality tiers of stainless...not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: Poor drainage
customer_reviews.text: The sink looks very nice but, there is not enough slope in the bottom for debris to go down the drain with the flow of water. You have to have a spray nozzle and wash the debris out of the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but if new construction allow for deep strainer.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sink. Plumber could not use strainer provided. It came to far down and he wouldn’t have room for trap so that was a disappointment. U will be polishing it every day if u want it to look clean with no finger prints but once done it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome!  It’s Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it’s 16 gauge so no dents!!! Love this sink... how it looks and how it’s so deep! The picture instructions for install are the only thing that aren’t the best.
customer_reviews.author: Koreen

customer_reviews.title: and it is beautiful! My carpenter installed it with no issues
customer_reviews.text: I looked at farmhouse sinks for weeks, and finally purchased the Zuhne farmhouse sink. It has been installed a couple of weeks now, and it is beautiful! My carpenter installed it with no issues. The stainless steel is a great quality. The depth of the sink is fantastic. I would definitely recommend this product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Game Diva

customer_reviews.title: You need a bigger cabinet then the sink!
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful sink! But we are remodeling our kitchen and I didn’t know or read the whole story. My sink cabinet is 36 inches and for a 36 inch sink you need a 39 inch base. So live and learn. And I’m 6 days past the return date because like most remodeling ran into pro with delays. But the sink is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Gillen

customer_reviews.title: Love my sink
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and quality of the stainless. Yes it's hard to keep the spots off. All stainless is hard to keep clean. I knew this going in. I love the look and the space it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Marr

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Look, but maybe not enough depth?
customer_reviews.text: Great look and price for a $300 +k modern farmhouse house we built for a client. Looks great, but functionally may be a little too short front to back. The front apron takes up the needed space. Would not be able to lay an average cookie sheet in flat. (See pics of almost finished kitchen) Bottom line: Buy for look and price. Don't Buy if bigtime chef or baker.
customer_reviews.author: HealthyNonna

customer_reviews.title: This is better than dreamed it would be
customer_reviews.text: OMG. This is better than dreamed it would be. Solid construction, thick stainless, deep bowl and beautifully simple. Excuse the picture, I couldn't wait until the kitchen was finished to post the picture. The packaging was very sturdy and the sink was in perfect condition. GREAT DEAL.
customer_reviews.author: casamima

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the kitchen !!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this while renovating kitchen at much less price than what's available in stores - very happy with purchase and it does look great in kitchen.....100% happy. Recently had some question about the product, customer representative (Tanya) was very helpful and responsive....Will definitely recommend this product as a welcome change to your kitchen !!!
customer_reviews.author: Sush Gan

customer_reviews.title: This sink looks like a million dollars. Buy Buy Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging for the product was awesome. I like the curved corners and the brushed stainless steel. The sink is very deep and quiet when pots are being banged around. The sink flange with the basket is so helpful when the food fills up you just grab the basket and dump it in the trash. The steel grate and cloth that comes with the sink are perfect to finish the look.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Scratches very easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought a SS sink since I had a porcelain one that stained easily - but I have just swapped one set of problems for another. SS is delicate and has to be babied. Sink itself is nicely made, was packed well and is working nicely but think hard if SS is the way you want to go.
customer_reviews.author: Micky Mirchandani

customer_reviews.title: Deep sink
customer_reviews.text: We installed this in our new kitchen and chose to do a slightly raised install. I will note the sink is already deep, so installing under the granite would make it even deeper. Note you need to build 2x4 support brackets underneath it, as it does not mount to the counter like typical undermount sinks do with clips. Finally, I would suggest raising the front lip slightly to increase drainage to the drain are of the sink. Water can sit in the sink a bit so we wipe it dry every night to prevent any rust or stains.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY SINK!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is quite HUGE and it doesn't have an echo sound at all cause its wrapped with insulation in the bottom of it. It comes with everything you need, except for the attachment to connect your trash compactor, so just keep in mind of that. It has everything else though and even a caddy to put your sponges in. I'm highly impressed with this sink. Zuhne will be our choice for the rest of the sinks in our home from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Premium at competitive price. Great install instructions to boot...
customer_reviews.text: Superb build quality, great, simple clean look/feel for a stainless steel apron sink. Seems quite sturdy and durable. Much, much nicer than anticipated based on the ultra-competitive pricing. This is a really great value and looks fantastic in place.
customer_reviews.author: FUBECA de PRIMEIRO

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is gorgeous, however the only problem I have is that food tends to not go down the drain very easily and accumulates in the sink. I don’t know if this is a design flaw or if all these kinds of sinks do this. It takes a fair amount of water to get all the debris out as it just swooshes from side to side. Love the size for big pots, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Eucharia Pieraccini

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great value
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and such a great value! Hasn't scratched the top yet . It's deep and the corners are round so nothing stays in the sink. I placed the rack in the bottom to protect it from scratches. Absolutely a great choice over the name brand expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good sink. Heavy, well built. The only that that was lame was you couldn’t use the plug and drain catcher if you have a disposal. Otherwise I like it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Lebeda

customer_reviews.title: Wow, Great Product- Great Price
customer_reviews.text: We were pleasantly surprised by the quality and the aesthetics of this sink. Very good value, solid packaging and thick material. This sink should last a long time. I would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Davis

customer_reviews.title: I am MORE than happy with this product and company so far
customer_reviews.text: I am MORE than happy with this product and company so far. Am in the process of installing it so will hold off on commenting on it's performance (stain resistance, quality of sound blocking, ease of cleaning, etc.). The delivery was quick, package undamaged, unit packed as if it were Fine China. Was VERY impressed and satisfied. No dents, dings, scratches, or issues with install, very straight forward. True craftsmenship.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware and accessories
customer_reviews.text: The sink was stunning but it was missing the mounting hardware and the stainless steel accessories for it. I tried calling to get these items so we could install and not return but nobody answered I'm so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: momof4

customer_reviews.title: Well made sink
customer_reviews.text: Received this beautiful sink earlier than expected-- a great surprise. Had to wait to give a review until it was installed. I love it so far- I don't see any future problems However, need to purchase a separate flange for the sink, if you are hooking to a garbage disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Luxie

customer_reviews.title: Thin netal
customer_reviews.text: I hated giving such a bad review but here’s the situation. Customer Service is outstanding! It’s the product. If you look at it wrong it will scratch. So I now have my beautiful Cambria quartz & a sink that looks awful. BTW ITS just my husband & i
customer_reviews.author: ramona r.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink but it has manufacturing defects in the finish
customer_reviews.text: Sending it back for defective finish on the interior of the sink. Will update review when I receive the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Kim

customer_reviews.title: I would give it a 5 star if only the bottom of the sink was graded a bit better. It does not drain efficiently compared to my ...
customer_reviews.text: The price and look of this sink make it a huge winner. I would give it a 5 star if only the bottom of the sink was graded a bit better. It does not drain efficiently compared to my last large sink. I have to manually move food particles to the drain, using the sprayer alone doesn't do the job. Also, the rubber mat which protects the bottom of the sink collects food and smells and must be removed and cleaned a few times a day. I just stopped using it, so the bottom now has scratches.
customer_reviews.author: MONICA Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful SS sink. Packing was great, no damage. Accessories very useful. Yes, the slope of the bottom does allow water to sit on the bottom like other reviews state BUT it's a sink...you don't like the water sitting in the bottom, wipe it with the towel they included in the package. 110% satisfied with this sink
customer_reviews.author: clay madrona

customer_reviews.title: The product is a five star. The description that ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is a five star. The description that it fits s 30 inch base cabinet is not accurate. The overall width is 29 3/4 so it fits s 33 inch base cabinet if you expect to have any cabinet left. I returned it for another size which cost me in excess of $30.00 but I did the same brand in the 24 inch size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How will they respond..., still waiting.
customer_reviews.text: I recieved and installed about a month ago. I have started to see a few very small rust spots in the sink. I called Zuhne and used the email on the website over a week ago, no response yet. I am Very concerned about the lack of response. I am hopeful they reply soon! Until then I will rate them very low.
customer_reviews.author: I McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Gook sink
customer_reviews.text: Good sink, we have had ours for about a year now. The are 2 issues we’ve noticed. first is It scratches easy especially at the bottom and second is it doesn’t drain perfectly. We have to push the water towards the drain. But it’s still a good sink!
customer_reviews.author: Pleite

customer_reviews.title: Best deal I've ever got from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I got this for 79.00. Yes 79.00 regularly 349.00. It is heavy duty not cheap. I must admit I was expecting it to be flimsy and exactly worth the 79.00 but no it is worth th 349.00 and more. Best deal I've ever got from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy this
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived and will be a while before it's installed in our new kitchen but this sink is GORGEOUS! The finish is beautiful, softly brushed which is just what I wanted instead of polished. Very well packed and protected. Includes the drain set which thrilled my husband. An excellent value, we looked at sinks that cost 3x the Zuhne and weren't as nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Size is great. it has a full apron on all sides so you can use it with an exposed side. The back has bumps which prevents your counter top from being installed flush to the back so it's beat used with the counter top over the top.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn M. Amadon

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived looking amazing, packaged well, and with all accessories . I got lucky with a cabinet that needed only a few mods . (36” cabinet for 33” sink with 30 “ bowl. I made rails to support sink . Get the short apron if you want to keep normal size doors underneath!
customer_reviews.author: patrick j mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of the sink but it could be ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the sink but it could be better functionality-wise. Food waste doesn't drain well. Not sure if it's the design of all apron sinks, but I have to wash out the corners constantly when food particles get stuck on the bottom. Then it pushes food to the other side, and then I have to repeat the process 2-3 times.
customer_reviews.author: gn

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is GORGEOUS. I get so many compliments on it. But, do know that it only fits in a 30" cabinet if you cut the top of the cabinet off. Super happy with it and I love the deep drain. And the towel that comes with it is incredible. I plan to write to the company to see if I can order more.
customer_reviews.author: emluchsinger

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Put the sink in my pottery studio. It is high quality, even the plumbers commented on it and its beauty. Love the sink and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink. Feels very sturdy and more durable than I thought it would be when I was looking at it online. So happy with this choice! This is a huge sink. I like the accessories that come with it (drain insert and cover, grate for bottom, suction cup for holding a sponge- which I don't use and probably won't use this piece, heavy duty drying towel). Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Caprice

customer_reviews.title: Holds up, bur needs to drain quicker
customer_reviews.text: I love it, but wish it drained better/faster. It’s beautiful and has really held up over the past 2.5 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great sink
customer_reviews.text: We have had this sink for about a year now and it looks great and is easy to clean.....beware not to use a scrubbing pad on it because it will leave scratch marks. simple sponge and 409 works well
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: High quality sink.
customer_reviews.text: Huge, open, high quality sink. It does not sound cheap or thin with the water running. It looks fabulous and I've gotten many compliments. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Rimmer

customer_reviews.title: Just an average stainless steel sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is just fine. It doesn't have enough pitch to drain the water. You have to wipe everything to dry off. It scratches easily but the grill that came with it helps. It was a decent size though.
customer_reviews.author: EJEE

customer_reviews.title: will buy them again for sure
customer_reviews.text: awesome product, sofar i have bought i think 4 of them myself for various projects and recomended them to many other people who are just as happy. i am a contractor
customer_reviews.author: Sherri F. Nester

customer_reviews.title: STUNNING SINK!
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful sink and came packaged very well. It's almost a pity that it sits below counter level, since even the sides are finished in stainless. This is the jewel in the crown of a remodel project. I will come back and post a photo once the countertops are installed.
customer_reviews.author: babybull

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a bery nice quality sink. Comes with the drain, spinge hokder and a microfiber dish cloth. Its well built and solid. Keep in mind this sink is designed so your faucet mounts through the countertop behind it so plan on that.
customer_reviews.author: Streetcart

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Stunning product, great price. This sink exceeds the quality of the big boys out there. Packaged beautifully, it arrived on time and in perfect condition. As we are just starting to build our house, I can't yet comment on the installation. But, I suspect my expectations will be met or exceeded.
customer_reviews.author: Quartet Bari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this sink!We installed above the quartz counters and still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: jeffy

customer_reviews.title: Nice sink (arrived damaged).
customer_reviews.text: The sink itself is great. However, it arrived damaged and it is unsure if the manufacturer or shipper damaged it. I plan to contact the manufacturer to discuss. Since the damage is to a lower back corner, and since I am short on time, I am installing it as is and it should look and work fine. Very nice sink and great looking. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sink
customer_reviews.text: Lots of positive feedback on the sink from friends. Looks great. Matches the stainless steel appliances. Most importantly, it hides lots of dishes :) Only been installed for a couple weeks. Hopefully it won't be too susceptible to scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Drumheller

customer_reviews.title: Huge and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using our sink now for about four months. So far no scratches and no rust. The the 33 inch sink is so much more useful than a 30 inch divided sink we had before the remodel. My only criticism is that I wish the bottom had slightly more slope to get food particles into the drain more efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: moss

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I love my new sink. I have never had a farm sink so I've had to get used to how strong I use my water. When I do get splashes it's so easily wipes off. The grate is anweaome to protect this investment and I love that it came with a holder for my sponge. Keeps it looking all clean and clutter free.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Great sink for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great sink for the price! Better than anything you can buy at depot or lowes. It's well insulated on the bottom to reduce sound, comes with bottom rack and plug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ZUHNE 30-Inch Single Bowl Farmhouse Curved Apron Front Stainless Steel Kitchen Sink 16-Gauge
feature_bullets: DEEP BASIN FARMERS SINK Installs undermount, flush or built-up on butcher block, laminate, quartz, granite or solid surface counter; Includes Drying Rack/Scratch Protector Grid, Sponge/Brush Holder and Drain Strainer

BEST REVIEWS Easy clean gently curved corners; X-fast drain and dry; Rated 9.8 of 10 on Amazon published Kitchen Sink Buying Guide – higher than ANY other brand; Better Business Bureau A+ rating; Inc5000 fastest growing company
QUIETEST SINK GLOBALLY Mutes noise during daily use; Cancels vibration from garbage disposal; 2.5x superior insulation; Drain boiling water, flush ice or defrost without damaging cabinets

16-GAUGE ULTRA DURABLE Solid T304 18-10 surgical grade stainless top to bottom; Rust and corrosion proof, dent and scratch resist; Same brushed finish as premium kitchen appliances; Gentle wipe keeps sink sparkling and hygienic forever

SAFEST CHOICE Certified US, Canada code compliant; Daily support from US call center; Lifetime warranty; Zero-lead non-toxic materials safe for families; Independently rated ‘Best kitchen sink in the last few years’

specifications.Included Components: Drying Rack/Grid Protector, Drain Strainer with Stopper, Suction Caddy/Sponge Holder, Cutout Template, Manual
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars549 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
